  • Classes in com.defano.jmonet.canvas.observable used by com.defano.jmonet.canvas 
    Class and Description
    CanvasCommitObserver
    An object which listens to changes being committed to a canvas.
    ChangeSetObserver
    An observer of modifications to a ChangeSet.
    ObservableSurface
    Represents an AWT component that can contain other components and report on keyboard and mouse interactions taking place inside of it.
    SurfaceInteractionObserver
    An observer of mouse and keyboard events taking place on a ScalableLayeredPainting.
